titles.title: Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act
A bill to provide for the expansion of the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan, Washington County, Utah.
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-528.

bill.summary:
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act
This bill expands the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan to include additional habitat for the desert tortoise in Utah and recognizes a transportation and utility corridor in the Beaver Dam Wash National Conservation Area.
